title: RSNA Aneurysm Labels Schema
description: Schema for RSNA Intracranial Aneurysm Detection Challenge labels

Left Infraclinoid Internal Carotid Arter.description: Probability of aneurysm in left infraclinoid ICA

Right Infraclinoid Internal Carotid Arte.description: Probability of aneurysm in right infraclinoid ICA

Left Supraclinoid Internal Carotid Arter.description: Probability of aneurysm in left supraclinoid ICA

Right Supraclinoid Internal Carotid Arte.description: Probability of aneurysm in right supraclinoid ICA

Left Middle Cerebral Artery.description: Probability of aneurysm in left MCA

Right Middle Cerebral Artery.description: Probability of aneurysm in right MCA

Left Anterior Cerebral Artery.description: Probability of aneurysm in left ACA

Right Anterior Cerebral Artery.description: Probability of aneurysm in right ACA

Left Posterior Communicating Artery.description: Probability of aneurysm in left PCoA

Right Posterior Communicating Artery.description: Probability of aneurysm in right PCoA

Basilar Tip.description: Probability of aneurysm at basilar tip

Other Posterior Circulation.description: Probability of aneurysm in other posterior circulation

Aneurysm Present.description: Overall probability of any aneurysm present
